text.en: From now through all my future births and lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni deng né kyé dang tserab su

text.en: May I encounter the teachings of the buddhas and meet genuine spiritual friends;
text.en-trans: gyalwé ten dang shenyen dampar tré

text.en: May I accomplish their instructions and realize the profound view;
text.en-trans: chi sung kadrub zabmö tawa tok

text.en: May I be rich with the self-sufficiency of precious bodhicitta;
text.en-trans: rinchen changchub sem kyi rangwang jor

text.en: And may I, relying on myself alone, carry out
The vast acts exemplified in the stories of the lives of the victorious bodhisattvas
text.en-trans: dzok min jangwa gyatsö chöpa kün

text.en: That lead to spiritual perfection, ripening, and purification!
text.en-trans: daknyi chikpü tamché chö gyur chik
